feed.title: Marcus Cvjeticanin - tooling
feed.subtitle: Software Engineer specialized in backend systems. Java, Kotlin, JVM, CI/CD, Concurrency, Distributed Systems, Decentralized Systems.

entry.title: Handy shortcuts in IntelliJ IDEA
entry.summary: IntelliJ IDEA is my daily driver. Since I was introduced to Eclipse for Java at my university a while ago and experienced the terror, I was looking for alternatives and I found Intellij. I use it all the time, and it's definitely my favorite IDE. All the other Jetbrains products such as PyCharm and WebStorm are also on the same high standard.

entry.title: Get started with Docker and Docker Compose
entry.summary: It’s hard to find a software company, besides embedded, that doesn’t take advantage of using Docker as their container solution. Even harder when it’s a company that focuses on the Web. There is a good reason why this is the case, it’s making life a lot easier for SWE/SRE/DevOps Engineers.
